description: Describe all the Fcc related Information of SAS

___frn.description: The FRN of the certified entity, if applicable. For a device, shall not be included.

___certificationConditions.description: Human-readable string or reference annotating the certification

___sasPhase.description: If this is a SAS information object, defines the Phase (1 or 2) of certification.

___certificationExpiration.description: Date of certification expiration, in format YYYY-MM-DD

___certificationDate.description: Date of certification, in format YYYY-MM-DD.
